Summary: Craft flew over me bright lights extremely quiet HUGE.
divs: Sighting Detailsi was driving down rt 117 in buxton maine talking on my cell phone to my girlfriend.it is a realy dark rd and its very country no airports or anything but trees and a few houses. i notice a huge thing coming from my left with 3 huge lights in the front. the bulbs lookied like they could be 6 ft or so in diamiter. this thing was only about 100 ft above the trees. i pulled over n got out of my car and tried to get a photo of it on my phone but i couldnt get the camera to turn on fast enough. this thing had no sound at all hardly. very faint.as it got directly above me the 2 out side lights turned off n the middle one stayed on. i could see the beems from the lights through the fog or mist that was in the air n it traveled about 3-4 football fields distance infront of the thing flying. it flew very very slowly and kept going over me. i hung up with my girlfriend and called my mother to see if she could see it from her house in the next town over . she said she couldnt. so i called my uncle and he said he thought he could but in a distance. after a few min it disapeared behind the tree line and i could no longer see it. i have kept this to my self other than the few people that i told that night. then i heard about you and i thought i should tell u . the way i heard about u was on tv. also on a different show on tv you were on, i saw a re creation of the exact thing i saw. or atleast similar to what you recreated with extreamly close detail . i dont get on my email much but i do get on it. i hope to hear from u and posibly figure this out. thank you very much. jason madara p.s. i forgot to mention i used to work for a major air line refuling pass jets and luggage and i know this wasnt any thing of that sort, it much much bigger. it scared me pretty good. i honestly did not have any clue what i was seeing. to this day i still think about it. and i still look to see if i will see it again and have not.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Buxton
There were no other sightings in Buxton on or around August 20th 2006
This sighting has never been favorited.
